alert/create.description: Create an alert on Network platforms.

body.info: The text or message you would like to send in the format you specified.

motd.info: Is the alert meant for the message of the day?

tips.info: Is this an alert to rotate in game?

web.info: Is this a website banner alert to display globally?

anticheat/flag.description: Flag a user via the anticheat and send to staff.

type.info: The type of hack that the player has been flagged for.

appeal/create.description: Create an appeal to remove a punishment.

punishmentId.info: The punishment ID the user is appealing.

appeal/$punishmentId/get.description: Get all comments on the selected appeal.

punishmentId.info: The punishment ID to view all comments on.

appeal/comment.description: Submit a comment, or if Staff, a staff note onto an existing appeal.

staffId.info: The id of the Staff member providing comment.

content.info: The content of the appeal comment.

appeal/accept.description: Accept and unpunish the user from an existing punishment.

staffId.info: The id of the Staff member providing comment.

content.info: The content of the appeal comment.

action.info: The action to take for the appeal. Note: I believe this is not required

appeal/deny.description: Deny and close existing appeal of an existing punishment.

staffId.info: The id of the Staff member providing comment.

content.info: The content of the appeal comment.

action.info: The action to take for the appeal. Note: I believe this is not required

appeal/escalate.description: Escalate an existing punishment to Senior Staff.

staffId.info: The id of the Staff member providing comment.

content.info: The content of the appeal comment.

action.info: The action to take for the appeal. Note: I believe this is not required

appeal/deescalate.description: De-escalate an existing punishment to Staff.

staffId.info: The id of the Staff member providing comment.

content.info: The content of the appeal comment.

action.info: The action to take for the appeal. Note: I believe this is not required

application/create.description: Create an application for users to apply for.

displayName.info: The display name for the application.

description.info: A short blurb of the application.

displayIcon.info: The icon to display from FontAwesome.

requirementsMarkdown.info: A link to a markdown file that renders the requirements for the role

redirectURL.info: The Google Form URL to redirect to

position.info: Which position should this application sit on the page

creatorId.info: The user ID for the submitter.

creationName.info: A short name of the creation.

discord/switch.description: Log a message to a Discord channel when user switches Server.

discord/directMessage.description: Log a message to a Discord channel when user sends a direct message to another user.

event/get.description: Get a list of all current events.

event/create.description: Create an event to be published.

name.info: The display name for the event.

icon.info: A link to an image that will be the icon to showcase the event.

hostingServer.info: The id of the server where the event will be hosted.

name.info: The display name for the event.

requestee.info: The user that has requested to be friends.
